name: Dossier "G": L'affaire du Rainbow-warrior
overview: Unclassifiable .. File G. It's not even a game! According to Cobra Soft, this is the first event program. Quickly written, quickly edited, it must also be consumed quickly. Only textual, while Basic, it is first of all a great burst of laughter in the form of snub. After reading real excerpts from newspaper articles, we can launch into the tree structure of questions, some serious, others completely crazy. The exploration of false leads also conceals many gags, puns and other humor. Dossier G. will annoy the uptight, and will only receive disillusioned criticism from fans of sumptuous graphics, insane animation. Lovers of wacky humor, on the other hand, should spend a moment, if possible in groups, to laugh together at the incredible findings of this software guaranteed to be 100% non-serious.
